recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Combine the cooked spaghetti and pancetta in the pan. Remove from heat.
Pour the egg mixture over the pasta and stir quickly until creamy.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken Soup
recipes.description: A comforting chicken soup with vegetables and flavorful broth.
instructions: In a large pot, add chicken pieces and cover with water. Bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer.
Skim off any foam that forms on the surface.
Add carrots, celery, and onions to the pot.
Simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
